item.title: About Faithfulst3ward.com
item.description: About This Site This site serves as a place to document how I setup various projects. It is first and foremost for my notes, but if you have stumbled across it I hope you find it useful. About FaithfulSt3ward Christian Husband Father IT / Security Guy

item.title: FaithfulSt3ward's Homelab
item.description: Current Inventory 1x Tripp Lite 6U Wall Mount Rack 1x UniFi Dream Machine Pro 1x Unifi Switch Pro 24 PoE 1x Unifi Pro Access Point 1x Synology 4 Bay NAS DiskStation DS918+ 2x Samsung SM951 128GB 4x WD Red 4TB NAS Drive 1x Raspberry Pi 4 1U Rack-Mount Bracket 6x Raspberry Pi 4 Model B 6x Raspberry Pi PoE Hat 6x SanDisk 64GB Extreme MicroSD
